name: CheckBoxContainer
description: The `CheckBoxContainer` class is a UI container component that combines a checkbox button with an associated text message. It provides a complete checkbox input component with click interaction handling, state management, and callback support. CheckBoxContainer is designed for use within custom screen layouts and UI systems where you need checkbox elements with descriptive text labels.
overview:
The `CheckBoxContainer` class provides a complete checkbox interface including:
- Interactive checkbox button with visual check/uncheck states
- Integrated text message/label displayed alongside the checkbox
- Click event handling with optional state change callbacks
- Position and size management within parent containers
- Visibility control for show/hide functionality
- Integration with the wagyourgui container system

constructors.signature: new CheckBoxContainer(x, y, width, height, textRenderer, defaultState, message, parent, setState)
constructors.description: Creates a new CheckBoxContainer with specified position, size, appearance, and behavior.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: X coordinate of the container's top-left corner

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: Y coordinate of the container's top-left corner

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Width of the container in pixels

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Height of the container in pixels

parameters.name: textRenderer
parameters.description: Minecraft text renderer for drawing text

parameters.name: defaultState
parameters.description: Initial checked state of the checkbox

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Text message/label to display next to the checkbox

parameters.name: parent
parameters.description: Parent container that manages this container

parameters.name: setState
parameters.description: Callback function called when checkbox state changes (optional)
